WebUpdate Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
MD5Context
WebUpdaterApp
WebUpdaterDlg
wxDownloadThreadThe thread helper which downloads the webupdate script and/or packages
wxMD5A utility class to calculate MD5 checksums from files or strings
wxSizeCacherThreadThis threads just retrieve the sizes of the given files and cache them
wxUIUpdateStopper
wxURLInputStreamCreates an input stream tied to the URL given in the constructor
wxWebUpdateAboutDlgThe about dialog shown by wxWebUpdateDlg
wxWebUpdateActionThe base abstract class for the handler of an <actions> subtag of a webupdate XML script
wxWebUpdateActionCopyThe "copy" action; can be used also as "move" action
wxWebUpdateActionExtractThe "extract" action
wxWebUpdateActionMkdirThe "mkdir" action
wxWebUpdateActionMkfileThe "mkfile" action
wxWebUpdateActionOpenThe "open" action
wxWebUpdateActionRunThe "run" action
wxWebUpdateAdvPanelThe advanced panel of a wxWebUpdateDlg which contains all connection settings options and some miscellaneous others
wxWebUpdateAdvPanelXmlHandlerThe XRC handler for wxWebUpdateAdvPanel
wxWebUpdateDlgThe dialog which lets the user update this program
wxWebUpdateDownloadContains the info about an available download
wxWebUpdateInstallerA singleton class which contains the list with all the registered wxWebUpdateAction which are recognized in the webupdate script in installation stage
wxWebUpdateInstallThreadThe thread used to install the packages
wxWebUpdateListCtrlThe wxListCtrl which lists the REMOTE packages available as they are parsed from the remote XML WebUpdate script
wxWebUpdateListCtrlXmlHandler
wxWebUpdateLocalPackageA simple container of the two basic info which wxWebUpdate classes need to know about user *local* packages: the NAME and the local VERSION
wxWebUpdateLocalXMLScriptThis is the class which performs the XML parsing of the webupdate LOCAL scripts; local scripts are used just to keep trace of the package installed on the PC and their versions
wxWebUpdateLogA wxLogPassThrough-derived log target for the WebUpdate classes
wxWebUpdatePackageContains the info about a package update
wxWebUpdatePlatformIdentifies uniquely a platform
wxWebUpdateXMLScriptThis is the class which performs all the XML parsing of the webupdate script
